entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
